entry.title: The Bizarre World of Fake Martial Arts

media:group.media:title: The Bizarre World of Fake Martial Arts
media:group.media:description:
**NOTE** People have been going to fightcommentarys channel and leaving hateful comments on some of their videos of Xu Xiadong. This is really messed up. Their videos where they talk about Xu being "disrespectful" were made BEFORE FCB (and everyone else) knew the full extent of Xus situation. There's also people "correcting" their timeline based on my video- again this is wrong- my video is not a chronological events of Xus story (and it wasn't meant to be), its a summary using the most relevant events with everything we know now about his current situation.
FCB has been THE English speaking channel covering Xus story, and they've been doing it for years. The only reason I know about it is because of their efforts. They should be commended for bringing Xus story to light, not harassed.
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/Supereyepatchwolf Tshirts: https://www.fangamer.com/collections/super-eyepatch-wolf Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/supereyepatchwolf

STEAMED HAMS:
But Theres a Different Animator Every 13 seconds: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a8R3qHKS-dk [ʸᵀᴾᴹᵛ] Steamed Hams Inc.: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aRsOBFhNjVM Steamed Hams but Chalmers is Everywhere: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-tUx4eksG1g Steamed Hams but it's Earthbound https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WKHahGY_5Qk Steamed Hams but it's edited in the style of Nier Automata https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L-XtMNYHsZc Steamed Hams but it's WWF No Mercy: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o0f73ww5ehE
Don’t talk about this in the video but this guy did a cool video essay just on steamed hams: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RsxoiWu0i3k
SIMPSONS COMICS/ ZINES:
Marge Simpsons Anime: https://margesimpsonanime.tumblr.com/ Depressing Simpsons Comics: https://www.etsy.com/listing/478073212/depressing-simpsons-comics-zine Ballad of Dark Homer (4 Pages as part of a large gallery) http://gunshowcomic.com/447 Simpsons Unreal Estate: http://www.mrdoyle.com/gallery Article About Simpsons Fan Zines (apologies, alot of the Zines dont have a direct web link): https://www.vice.com/en_uk/article/a3j39j/the-true-spirit-of-the-simpsons-lives-on-in-these-bootleg-zines
BARTKIRA http://www.bartkira.com/
SIMPSONS WAVE:
Lucien Hughes: ２１０ ＬＩＬＡＣ ＳＫＹ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=COPAV3onrKs C R I S I S https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FCb3rblTEds DEAD BART: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5DrvXlCtCXw ＳＵＮＤＡＹ ＳＣＨＯＯＬ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rTfa-9aCTYg
Sources:
Fantastic write up by Dead Homer Society on Simpsons tapped out: https://deadhomersociety.com/tag/the-simpsons-tapped-out/
Simpsons Tv Ratings (based on Nielsen ratings, the standard used by american Tv broadcasting ) : https://tvseriesfinale.com/tv-show/the-simpsons-season-30-ratings/
Forbes article on Simpsons Ratings: https://www.forbes.com/sites/niallmccarthy/2017/04/20/30-years-on-and-the-simpsons-isnt-aging-well-infographic/#55427bb26967
Most image of bootleg merchandise from: https://twitter.com/bootlegbart
Review Scores for The Simpsons taken from review aggregates of Rotten Tomatos (Season by Season Audience Score, insufficient data for critic score) and IMDB, (Review aggregate of individual episode IMDB ratings)
Source: Electronic Arts Q1 FY14 Financial Report: https://news.ea.com/press-release/archive/electronic-arts-reports-q1-fy14-financial-results

entry.title: Shenmue and The Fall of Sega

media:group.media:title: Shenmue and The Fall of Sega
media:group.media:description:
My new video about the what the Internet did to Sonic The Hedgehog: https://t.co/mSFl1g6tGZ?amp=1
A long time ago, Sega made Shenmue, a weird forklift simulator, and some people didn’t like it, BUT I DID
Tshirts: https://www.fangamer.com/collections/super-eyepatch-wolf Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/Supereyepatchwolf
Lets Fight a Boss Podcast:
Itunes: https://itunes.apple.com/ie/podcast/lets-fight-a-boss/id1048483221?mt=2 Sound Cloud: https://soundcloud.com/letsfightaboss Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCawXJIKUj2o_tFPMZ4xiXBw
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/super_eyepatch_wolf/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/EyePatchWolf
Sources:
Euro Gamer: The Rise and Fall of Sega
https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2012-02-22-the-rise-and-fall-of-sega-enterprises
Polygon Yu Suzuki Interview https://www.polygon.com/2014/3/19/5527120/yu-suzuki-shenmue-gdc-2014-classic-game-postmortem
Interview where Nagoshi (Yakuza Creator) talks about Shemnue https://www.gamesradar.com/from-shenmue-to-yakuza-toshihiro-nagoshi-looks-back-on-an-illustrious-career-of-japanese-game-development/
Gamespot Shenmue Review https://www.gamespot.com/reviews/shenmue-review/1900-2540599/
(This article is a wiki as the original live journal is locked) https://crappygames.miraheze.org/wiki/Backlash_at_GameSpot%27s_Shenmue_Review
Yu Suzuki talking about Shenmues 16 Chapters: http://www.shenmuedojo.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=5&t=48975
IGN review
https://ie.ign.com/articles/2000/11/04/shenmue
Blogpost from original 6.8 Shenmue Reviewer about his review (I could not for the life of me find the original 6.8 review): https://lbd-nytetrayn.livejournal.com/1166264.html
Dreamcast games on Xbox
"This Month in Gaming History". Game Informer. Vol. 12 no. 105. GameStop. January 2002. p. 117.
http://archive.videogamesdaily.com/features/sega_yu_suzuki_iv_feb06_p4.asp
Old Article from IGN about Virtua Fighter Quest https://web.archive.org/web/19990218041724/http://dreamcast.ign.com/news/5927.html
Shenmue 2 sales https://web.archive.org/web/20060221044930/http://www.ownt.com/qtakes/2003/gamestats/gamestats.shtm
The disappearance of Yu Suzuki:
https://web.archive.org/web/20121107063936/http://www.1up.com/features/disappearance-suzuki-part-1
https://web.archive.org/web/20150629181949/http://www.1up.com/features/disappearance-suzuki-part-2?pager.offset=4
Why Shenmues voice acting was terrible (Archived version for the way back machine): https://web.archive.org/web/20100517092309/http://www.shenmuedojo.net/JeremyBlaustein2.shtml
Additional footage from: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nhIaFY4jVMU
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jhbTQo9y6Q8
Song List: https://imgur.com/a/9PaFruX
